Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.hugb.TicTacToe

  • public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToe(int gridSize)
      New instance of TicTacToe with the ability to choose the grid size Setup must be called before the game can start.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBlockState(int id)
      Returns the state of an individual block with a set row and column based on id
      int getState()
      Checks the state of the game whether either player has won or need to keep going.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToe

        public TicTacToe(int gridSize)
        New instance of TicTacToe with the ability to choose the grid size Setup must be called before the game can start.
        Parameters:
        gridSize - the size of the gameboard grid

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets up the board, current player and total moves

      • setBlockState

        public boolean setBlockState(int id)
        Sets the state of a block with a certain id. The state set depends on the current player
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the block in the game grid which needs to change.
        Returns:
        false if the block already has a state, true if not.

      • getBlockState

        public int getBlockState(int id)
        Returns the state of an individual block with a set row and column based on id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the block in the gameboard trying to fetch.
        Returns:
        the row and column of the block.

      • getState

        public int getState()
        Checks the state of the game whether either player has won or need to keep going.
        Returns:
        the state of the game. 0 = keep going, 1 = X wins, 2 = O wins, 3 = tie
